mapper.update: update d_druginstore set billid=billid ,billdate=#{billdate} ,billcode=#{billcode} ,drgvender=#{drgvender} ,indate=#{indate} ,intype=#{intype} ,repuser=#{repuser} ,checkresult=#{checkresult} ,checkuser1=#{checkuser1} ,checkuser2=#{checkuser2} ,checkuser3=#{checkuser3} ,checkuser4=#{checkuser4} ,checkuser5=#{checkuser5} ,drugbuyid=#{drugbuyid} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,updateuserid=#{updateuserid} ,updatetime=#{updatetime} ,carryuser1=#{carryuser1} ,carryuser2=#{carryuser2} ,unitmanager=#{unitmanager} where billid=#{billid}

update d_druginstore set billid=billid ,billdate=#{billdate} ,billcode=#{billcode} ,billstate=#{billstate} ,drgvender=#{drgvender} ,indate=#{indate} ,intype=#{intype} ,repuser=#{repuser} ,checkresult=#{checkresult} ,checkuser1=#{checkuser1} ,checkuser2=#{checkuser2} ,checkuser3=#{checkuser3} ,checkuser4=#{checkuser4} ,checkuser5=#{checkuser5} ,drugbuyid=#{drugbuyid} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,updateuserid=#{updateuserid} ,updatetime=#{updatetime} ,carryuser1=#{carryuser1} ,carryuser2=#{carryuser2} ,unitmanager=#{unitmanager} where 1=1 and billid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and billid =#{Where_Id} and billid=#{Where_billid} and billdate=#{Where_billdate} and billcode=#{Where_billcode} and billstate=#{Where_billstate} and drgvender=#{Where_drgvender} and indate=#{Where_indate} and intype=#{Where_intype} and repuser=#{Where_repuser} and checkresult=#{Where_checkresult} and checkuser1=#{Where_checkuser1} and checkuser2=#{Where_checkuser2} and checkuser3=#{Where_checkuser3} and checkuser4=#{Where_checkuser4} and checkuser5=#{Where_checkuser5} and drugbuyid=#{Where_drugbuyid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and updateuserid=#{Where_updateuserid} and updatetime=#{Where_updatetime} and carryuser1=#{Where_carryuser1} and carryuser2=#{Where_carryuser2} and unitmanager=#{Where_unitmanager}
mapper.select: select t.billid "billid", t.billdate "billdate", t.billcode "billcode", t.billstate "billstate", t.drgvender "drgvender", t.indate "indate", t.intype "intype", t.repuser "repuser", t.checkresult "checkresult", t.checkuser1 "checkuser1", t.checkuser2 "checkuser2", t.checkuser3 "checkuser3", t.checkuser4 "checkuser4", t.checkuser5 "checkuser5", t.drugbuyid "drugbuyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.updateuserid "updateuserid", t.updatetime "updatetime", t.carryuser1 "carryuser1", t.carryuser2 "carryuser2", t.unitmanager "unitmanager", lc.companyname "companyname", lgp.groupname "groupname", lgd.graindepotname "graindepotname" from d_druginstore t left join l_company lc on lc.companyid=t.companyid left join l_group lgp on lgp.groupid=t.groupid left join l_graindepot lgd on lgd.graindepotid=t.graindepotid where billid=#{billid}

select t.billid "billid", t.billdate "billdate", t.billcode "billcode", t.billstate "billstate", t.drgvender "drgvender", t.indate "indate", t.intype "intype", t.repuser "repuser", t.checkresult "checkresult", t.checkuser1 "checkuser1", t.checkuser2 "checkuser2", t.checkuser3 "checkuser3", t.checkuser4 "checkuser4", t.checkuser5 "checkuser5", t.drugbuyid "drugbuyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.updateuserid "updateuserid", t.updatetime "updatetime", t.carryuser1 "carryuser1", t.carryuser2 "carryuser2", t.unitmanager "unitmanager" from d_druginstore t where 1=1 and t.billid=#{billid} and t.billdate=#{billdate} and t.billcode=#{billcode} and t.billstate=#{billstate} and t.drgvender=#{drgvender} and t.indate=#{indate} and t.intype=#{intype} and t.repuser=#{repuser} and t.checkresult=#{checkresult} and t.checkuser1=#{checkuser1} and t.checkuser2=#{checkuser2} and t.checkuser3=#{checkuser3} and t.checkuser4=#{checkuser4} and t.checkuser5=#{checkuser5} and t.drugbuyid=#{drugbuyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.updateuserid=#{updateuserid} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime} and t.carryuser1=#{carryuser1} and t.carryuser2=#{carryuser2} and t.unitmanager=#{unitmanager}

select t.billid "billid", t.billdate "billdate", t.billcode "billcode", t.billstate "billstate", t.drgvender "drgvender", t.indate "indate", t.intype "intype", t.repuser "repuser", t.checkresult "checkresult", t.checkuser1 "checkuser1", t.checkuser2 "checkuser2", t.checkuser3 "checkuser3", t.checkuser4 "checkuser4", t.checkuser5 "checkuser5", t.drugbuyid "drugbuyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.updateuserid "updateuserid", t.updatetime "updatetime", t.carryuser1 "carryuser1", t.carryuser2 "carryuser2", t.unitmanager "unitmanager" from d_druginstore t where 1=1 and t.billid=#{billid} and t.billdate=#{billdate} and t.billcode=#{billcode} and t.billstate=#{billstate} and t.drgvender=#{drgvender} and t.indate=#{indate} and t.intype=#{intype} and t.repuser=#{repuser} and t.checkresult=#{checkresult} and t.checkuser1=#{checkuser1} and t.checkuser2=#{checkuser2} and t.checkuser3=#{checkuser3} and t.checkuser4=#{checkuser4} and t.checkuser5=#{checkuser5} and t.drugbuyid=#{drugbuyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.updateuserid=#{updateuserid} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime} and t.carryuser1=#{carryuser1} and t.carryuser2=#{carryuser2} and t.unitmanager=#{unitmanager}
mapper.delete: delete from d_druginstore where 1=1 and billid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and billid =#{Where_Id} and billid=#{Where_billid} and billdate=#{Where_billdate} and billcode=#{Where_billcode} and billstate=#{Where_billstate} and drgvender=#{Where_drgvender} and indate=#{Where_indate} and intype=#{Where_intype} and repuser=#{Where_repuser} and checkresult=#{Where_checkresult} and checkuser1=#{Where_checkuser1} and checkuser2=#{Where_checkuser2} and checkuser3=#{Where_checkuser3} and checkuser4=#{Where_checkuser4} and checkuser5=#{Where_checkuser5} and drugbuyid=#{Where_drugbuyid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and updateuserid=#{Where_updateuserid} and updatetime=#{Where_updatetime} and carryuser1=#{Where_carryuser1} and carryuser2=#{Where_carryuser2} and unitmanager=#{Where_unitmanager}
mapper.select: select t.billid "billid", t.billdate "billdate", t.billcode "billcode", t.billstate "billstate", t.drgvender "drgvender", t.indate "indate", t.intype "intype", t.repuser "repuser", t.checkresult "checkresult", t.checkuser1 "checkuser1", t.checkuser2 "checkuser2", t.checkuser3 "checkuser3", t.checkuser4 "checkuser4", t.checkuser5 "checkuser5", t.drugbuyid "drugbuyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.updateuserid "updateuserid", t.updatetime "updatetime", t.carryuser1 "carryuser1", t.carryuser2 "carryuser2", t.unitmanager "unitmanager", lc.companyname "companyname", lgp.groupname "groupname", lgd.graindepotname "graindepotname" from d_druginstore t left join l_company lc on lc.companyid=t.companyid left join l_group lgp on lgp.groupid=t.groupid left join l_graindepot lgd on lgd.graindepotid=t.graindepotid where 1=1 and t.billid=#{billid} and t.billdate=#{billdate} and t.billcode=#{billcode} and t.billstate=#{billstate} and t.drgvender=#{drgvender} and t.indate=#{indate} and t.intype=#{intype} and t.repuser=#{repuser} and t.checkresult=#{checkresult} and t.checkuser1=#{checkuser1} and t.checkuser2=#{checkuser2} and t.checkuser3=#{checkuser3} and t.checkuser4=#{checkuser4} and t.checkuser5=#{checkuser5} and t.drugbuyid=#{drugbuyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.updateuserid=#{updateuserid} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime} and t.carryuser1=#{carryuser1} and t.carryuser2=#{carryuser2} and t.unitmanager=#{unitmanager}

select count(*) from d_druginstore t where 1=1 and t.billid=#{billid} and t.billid!=#{NoId} and t.billdate=#{billdate} and t.billcode=#{billcode} and t.billstate=#{billstate} and t.drgvender=#{drgvender} and t.indate=#{indate} and t.intype=#{intype} and t.repuser=#{repuser} and t.checkresult=#{checkresult} and t.checkuser1=#{checkuser1} and t.checkuser2=#{checkuser2} and t.checkuser3=#{checkuser3} and t.checkuser4=#{checkuser4} and t.checkuser5=#{checkuser5} and t.drugbuyid=#{drugbuyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.updateuserid=#{updateuserid} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime} and t.carryuser1=#{carryuser1} and t.carryuser2=#{carryuser2} and t.unitmanager=#{unitmanager}
SELECT max(billcode) FROM d_druginstore where billcode like CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-%d"),"%") and graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
